channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21631] Enhance metastore API to allow bulk-loading materialized views
item.description:
Currently, every query in HS2 results in a metastore call per database to retrieve all materialized views. This causes severe performance degradation on multi-tenant clusters with thousands of databases (very similar to how the old get_function() metastore call didn't scale).

We should add a metastore call which can retrieve all materialized view definitions at once (for all DBs) so that we don't have to make thousands of metastore calls per query.
item.summary: Enhance metastore API to allow bulk-loading materialized views

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: No need to have this as a sub-task under the umbrella for materialized views enhancements that was already closed, I've converted it to issue.

-1 overall
